categories: Quick Stop 10mm x 1.8m Combination Cable Lock
description: A solid and simple cable lock with a re-settable combination, for securing your wheels to the frame and for locking up in low-risk areas.10mm steel cable with a plastic cover protects your bike finish.Re-settable Dial E-Z Set™ combination is pick proof, impact resistant and extremely strong.Includes a Quickclip mounting bracket.To secure an expensive bike, or any bike in a public, high-risk area, we recommend a strong U-lock or a combination U-lock and cable lock.
name: Planet Bike Quick Stop 10mm x 1.8m Combination Cable Lock
